title: What Lane\Position Do You Main?
body: I wanted to make this to give me more of an idea on which role to main, also just to see what role other people like.

replies.body:
> What Lane/**Position** Do You Main?

Finally someone gets it right. +1 right there.

I'm an ADC/Top man. For The Quinn!
What's a Quinn? I've never heard of this fabled champion.
Only those with divine power are allowed to know of her existence.
Very nice to see support mains, i love it when i get a support main on my team. they completely destroy the other team..

> [{quoted}](name=FruitSalad,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=ALAAhkku,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-17T10:51:32.285+0000)
>
> Very nice to see support mains, i love it when i get a support main on my team. they completely destroy the other team..

It's not very hard to play support if you have common sense..
oh? what makes you say that?
I agree, i thought support would be the lowest

I play an equal amount of top and jungle so I can't really choose one option. I tend to play Malphite and Wukong in top and jungle.

Lately though I was planning on getting into some Wukong mid
